title: Rice growing in New South Wales
creator_credit: New South Wales. Dept. of Education
brief_description: Introduces briefly the essential soil and rainfall requirements for rice growing in NSW. Shows the steps taken by the farmer to grow the rice, including fertilization, sowing, irrigation and harvesting of the crop.
description: Introduces briefly the essential soil and rainfall requirements for rice growing in NSW. Shows the steps taken by the farmer to grow the rice, including fertilization, sowing, irrigation and harvesting of the crop.
